creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: round green insect/ beetle with yellow and black intersecting lines that form a diamond shape in center; two light green circles at bottom right and bottom left body of insect; series of black dots forming lines in bottom right and left of wings; double ended curving arrow in bottom center of body; three legs on either side of body
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Ladybug B
